results.definition: something many people believe that is false
examples: they have the illusion that I am very wealthy

results.definition: a kind of imagination that was held by Coleridge to be more casual and superficial than true imagination

examples: he had a fondness for whiskey

results.definition: imagine; conceive of; see in one's mind
examples: I can't see him on horseback!
I can see what will happen
I can see a risk in this strategy

results.definition: have a fancy or particular liking or desire for
examples: She fancied a necklace that she had seen in the jeweler's window
